Package uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.simulatedplayers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardDifficultyGenerator
    Class that contains auxiliary functions for estimating certain difficulty aspects of the board.
    DepthPotentialIngredientPlayer  
    DepthPotentialJellyPlayer
    As the aim is to clear all jellies we can use the number of jellies on the board as distance.
    DepthPotentialPlayer
    A class of players that is based on the a * search.
    DepthPotentialScorePlayer
    Simple Evaluation: Metric = current score, Potential = best score after one move
    GameStateCombinedMetric
    Class that contains the combined evaluation for the current form of the gameState and its potential to reach the required target.
    GameStateMetric
    The metric for a single game state.
    GameStatePotential
    Class that contains the information after evaluating a state based on how promising the current game state is, to reach the target.
    GameStateWithCombinedMetric
    Storage class that keeps the metric of a game state together with the game state and the original move that lead to this state.
    IngredientDepthPotentialPlayer
    Player that attempts to solve ingredient levels.
    JellyRemoverPlayerLuna
    Player that removes jelly based on the jellies remaining on the board, the potential to remove this jellies in the next moves, the potential to make combinable or special candies and the potential to remove blockers.
    MayanScorePlayer
    Score player that uses several considerations in the metric apart from score distance, including the difficulty of removing certain jellies, the probability of removing blockers in close rounds, encourages the formation of candies and the generation of combinable candies.
    MovesAffectingCell
    Storage class that contains the number of moves available below and above a cell.
    PlayerAssessmentRecord
    The assessment record for a player on a single level.
    RuleBasedAuxiliaryFunctions
    Class that contains the functions used by the rule based players.
    RuleBasedIngredientsPlayer
    This is a simple rule based player for removing ingredients.
    RuleBasedJellyPlayer
    This is a simple rule based player for clearing jelly levels.
    ScalarCombinedMetric
    One of the simplest forms of GameStateCombinedMetrics that contains a real scalar and will be used to indicate the distance from the target (i.e.
    ScalarGameMetric
    One of the simplest forms of GameStateMetrics that contains a real scalar and will be used to indicate the distance from the target (i.e.
    ScalarGamePotential
    One of the simplest forms of GameStatePotentials that contains a real scalar and will be used to indicate the distance from the target (i.e.
    ScorePlayerAlpha
    Very basic player, simply search for first available move and make it.
    ScorePlayerBeta
    Basic player, find the move that makes the longest match and make it.
    SimulatedPlayerAssessment
    Class that is responsible for the assessment of players based on the records of several players.
    SimulatedPlayerBase
    Class that contains the basic functions that all simulated players should implement.
    SimulatedPlayerManager
    Class that is used to select the appropriate players according to ability and the game mode.
    TargetCellPlayer
    Player that is designed using the principle of the depth potential player and focuses to clear the jelly from the cell located at the position that this player had been initialised for.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GroupPlayerStats
    Class that contains the statistics for Game Levels as provided by the Candy Crush Wikia.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoMovesFoundException
    Exception raised when no moves where found in a simulated player for a given GameState.
